title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list and delete models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio wrapper for Ollama; chat, stream, embeddings, tool calling and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package adding Ollama LLM, chat and embeddings components with one-line swap-in for OpenAI.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs entirely in browser or via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with synchronous, asynchronous and reactive (RxJava) APIs; Maven Central available.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; supports chat, generate, pull, embeddings and streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with chat history, syntax highlighting and model switching on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot with inline suggestions and chat panel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub; one-command local LLM server.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM provider letting you call Ollama models through a unified OpenAI-compatible endpoint with proxy & budget tracking.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint including chat, embeddings and model files.

title: ollama-chat-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that streams Ollama responses with session memory and model selector dropdown.

title: ollama-rag
summary: End-to-end RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs entirely offline.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query any local model with streaming replies in threads.

title: ollama-npm-package
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript-first client for Ollama; 100 kB, zero dependencies, ESM & CommonJS.

title: ollama-pypi-package
summary: Official PyPI package; lightweight Python client auto-generated from OpenAPI spec, supports sync & async streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components for production pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST API with async tokio support and strong typing.
